original: “Dhammo kho, mahārāja, sabbasukhumo, na kho, mahārāja, dhammā sabbe sukhumā, ‘sukhuman’ti vā ‘thūlan’ti vā dhammānametamadhivacanaṁ.
analyzed: ▁dhammo ▁kho ▁mahārāja ▁sabba sukhum o ▁na ▁kho ▁mahārāja ▁dhammā ▁sabbe ▁sukhum ā ▁sukhum anti ▁vā ▁thūl anti ▁vā ▁dhammā n amet ama dhi vacan aṃ

original: Yaṁ kiñci chinditabbaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ paññāya chindati, natthi dutiyaṁ paññāya chedanan”ti.
analyzed: ▁yaṃ ▁kiñci ▁chind itabbaṃ ▁sabbaṃ ▁taṃ ▁paññāya ▁chind ati ▁natthi ▁dutiy aṃ ▁paññāya ▁ ched an anti
